name: rs07
title: Redelings & Suchard (2007) model of insertions and deletions.

citation.title: Incorporating indel information into phylogeny estimation for rapidly emerging pathogens.

args.description: The log of the insertion-deletion rate

description:
This model allows insertion and deletions (indels) of multiple residues.  Indel lengths are geometrically distributed. Insertions and deletions are symmetric in this model.
Note that the insertion-deletion rate is normalized to the substitution rate, so that if log_rate=0, then the insertion-deletion rate is the same as the substitution rate.
Note that the mean indel length must be at least 1.
